roleset.name: to divide into parts and distribute
roleset.note: PARCEL_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'parcel' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from parcel.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The newspaper Leninskoye Zamya said [0] the committee decided [0]the plan [*] to parcel out economic powers previously exercised [*] by Moscow to the country 's 15 republics `` does n't reflect the radical changes in the Soviet federation . ''
example.arg: economic powers previously exercised [*] by Moscow
